item.title: Roguelite exploration and vehicle game TankHead announced for PC, now available
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/12/roguelite-exploration-and-vehicle-game-tankhead-announced-for-pc-now-available

  • PC

A surprise release from Toronto-based studio Alpha Channel.

Toronto-based developer Alpha Channel has announced TankHead, a roguelite game built around exploration and vehicle gameplay. It is available now for PC via Epic Games Store at a 17 percent-off discount price of $24.89 until December 18, after which it will cost $29.99.

Here is an overview of the game, via Epic Games Store:

About

Embark on a thrilling journey as Whitaker, piloting a drone-controlled tank through the desolate ECA. Battle fierce enemies, scavenge valuable parts, and fight to survive in this fast-paced science-fiction world, as you strive to reach the mysterious Highpoint.

Key Features

  • Fight to Reach Highpoint – As Whitaker your goal is to fight to reach Highpoint, to do that you must traverse the ECA—an area where humans cannot survive. Whitaker must project his mind into a Needle, a robust drone capable of surviving in the harsh conditions of the ECA—and of piloting your Tank. Use your Needle and Tank to combat the vehicles and creatures of the ECA to reach Highpoint.
  • Rich, Detailed Science-Fiction World – Explore the ECA a world torn apart by war and a mysterious cataclysmic event that left it uninhabitable by humans. Where humans must “tele-project” their minds into drones in order to survive and pillage the remains of a once great society.
  • Fast-Paced Tank Combat – Your vehicle of choice is a Light Tank; capable of moving quickly and delivering devastating damage to your enemies and the reactive world around you. Your tank can be equipped with various weapons, armor, wheels, motors and abilities to customize your gameplay.
  • Dismantle and Destroy – Use a variety of weaponry to dismantle your enemies, blow off parts, to get a clear shot at their vulnerable weak points to deliver decisive blows. Defeated enemies leave behind their remaining parts for you to salvage or steal. Take what you need, scrap the rest. Use everything to survive.

Watch the launch trailer and a gameplay overview video below.

Launch Trailer

Game Overview and Tips

item.title: Bionic Bay launches March 13, 2025
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/12/bionic-bay-launches-march-13-2025

  • PC
  • PS5

Physics-based action platformer dated.

Side-scrolling action platformer Bonic Bay will launch for PlayStation 5 and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store on March 13, 2025, publisher Kepler Interactive and developers Mureena and Psychoflow announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via its store pages:

About

Bionic Bay is a unique physics-based platformer with action, creative game mechanics and a mysterious world crafted with exceptional detail.
It introduces a unique Swap mechanic, allowing players to interact with the physics-based world in new ways. The immersive gameplay is
completed by spectacular environments and creative level design.

Key Features

  • Innovative swap mechanism offers players a new way of interacting with the environment. It can be used to move, defend or attack.
  • Stunning environments with an incredible attention to detail.
  • An extraordinary world with massive levels.
  • Extremely physics based gameplay. Tons of dynamic objects, particles and liquids with large variety of physical properties makes the gameplay exceptionally fun and unique.

Watch a new trailer below.

Release Date Trailer
